about_the_game:
Step into a world where reality and imagination collide in Metaneurosis, a turn-based RPG with strategy elements that weaves humor, heart, and wacky scenarios into one unforgettable adventure.

As a character struggling with life’s challenges, you’ll explore vast, surreal worlds inspired by the thoughts, dreams, and struggles of troubled individuals. Your journey will force you to confront choices that shape not only your own future but also the fate of others.

Key Features

  • Turn-Based Tactical Combat: Control a party of uniquely quirky characters in battles that balance strategy and chaos.

  • Explore Multiple Worlds: Explore dreamscapes and alternate realities, each with its own bizarre logic, humor, and challenges.

  • Choices Matter: Your actions influence the narrative and lead to multiple endings—from redemption to ruin.

  • Dark Humor Meets Heartfelt Themes: Experience laugh-out-loud absurdity one moment and gut-wrenching emotion the next.

  • Customize Your Team: Build your squad with a mix of goofy and powerful abilities, each contributing to your strategy.

  • Solve Puzzles and Overcome Challenges: Unravel secrets, find loot, and outsmart enemies in a mix of exploration and problem-solving.

  • Character Creation: Customize your character and unlock new outfits to express your style as you progress through the game.

Whether you’re battling undead seagulls, solving allegorical puzzles, or unlocking Easter eggs, Metaneurosis is a love letter to RPGs and the weirdness of the human experience.

content_descriptors.notes: This game explores mature themes, including substance use, addiction, and the struggles of navigating a healthcare system that prioritizes profit over care. Players will face difficult choices, with potential consequences such as personal hardship and life deterioration. These elements are integral to the narrative, offering a thought-provoking exploration of adversity and human resilience.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 / 11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 or AMD FX-4100
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or equivalent
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Designed to run on most modern systems. Performance feedback is welcome.
